item.title: Fly tipping bed and draw unit, 1st December
item.description:
There has been a double mattress with base unit and Chester draw unit dumped at the corner of Ridge Road and Kent Road. This has happened today between 8.45am and 6.45pm today the 1st December. I noticed it when I got home from work. It was totally blocking the pathway so I had to tidy it up to make safe for pedestrians and also it was all moving in the strong winds.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ridge Road, Edmonton, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Can’t see any of the drains as there are so many wet leaves cluttering the paths, gullies and roads, 1st December
item.description:
All the drains are blocked in and around bottom of Madeline/Anerley Road. Wet weather and water leaks exacerbating flooded paths around the bus stop as it is at the bottom of the hill.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Madeline Road, Crystal Palace, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped rubbish, 1st December
item.description:

item.title: Abandoned Car, 1st December
item.description:
Car seems to be abandoned. Blocking people crossing the pavement comfortably and half sticking out in the road. checked online and car is untaxed and MOT is out of date. Noticed the car from the morning of the 1-12-2025

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Westhorne Avenue, Eltham

item.title: Street lighting, 1st December
item.description:
Despite a report last week, there is STILL no street lighting in Versailles Road SE20 8AX. Not only is this is dangerous for pedestrians and drivers, but is also a concern, re criminal activity.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, Versailles Road, Crystal Palace, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping attracting rodents in an area with children, 1st December
item.description:
Constant fly tipping area. Now some mattress and furniture. After reporting, it takes ages to be clear attracting more fly tipping and rodents, having children in the area.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Bunton Street, Woolwich
Report on FixMyStreet
